title: Rising energy costs increase PL, decrease rGDP

content.question: An increase in energy costs will most likely cause the price level and real gross domestic product to change in which of the following ways?

choices.label:
Price Level
 Real Gross Domestic Product

Increase
 Increase

Price Level
 Real Gross Domestic Product

Increase
 Decrease

Price Level
 Real Gross Domestic Product

Increase
 Not change

Price Level
 Real Gross Domestic Product

Decrease
 Increase

Price Level
 Real Gross Domestic Product

Decrease

Decrease

content.answer:
Price Level
 Real Gross Domestic Product

Increase
 Decrease

topic.text: 3.6: Changes in the AD-AS Model in the Short Run

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
